title: Materials Selection in Mechanical Design 4th c2011 Ashby txtbk
description:
Materials Selection in Mechanical Design, 4th Edition (c2011), a textbook by Michael F. Ashby.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://store.elsevier.com/Materials-Selection-in-Mechanical-Design/Michael-Ashby/isbn-9781856176637/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://store.elsevier.com/Materials-Selection-in-Mechanical-Design/Michael-Ashby/isbn-9781856176637/</a>

AUDIENCE: Undergraduate and graduate students majoring in engineering disciplines including materials science, mechanical, aerospace and automotive engineering, engineering design and industrial design.

CONTENTS:
1. Introduction.
2. The design process.
3. Engineering materials and their properties.
4. Material property charts.
5. Materials selection - The basics.
6. Materials selection - Case studies.
7. Multiple constraints and conflicting objectives.
8. Case studies - Multiple constraints and conflicting objectives.
9. Selection of material and shape.
10. Selection of material and shape: Case studies.
11. Designing hybrid materials.
12. Hybrids - Case studies.
13. Processes and process selection.
14. Process selection - Case studies.
15. Materials and the environment.
16. Materials and industrial design.
17. Forces for change.

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (71 MB).
compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.
